mining.Description:
Cryptocurrency mining is the validation of transactions on the blockchain. Once validated, these transactions are added to the blockchain's public ledger of past transactions.
For this effort, successful miners receive new cryptocurrency as a reward.

platform.Description: The technology of computer systems that defines how a system is operated as a foundation, upon which other processes, application or technologies are developed.

staking.Description: The process of holding funds in a cryptocurrency wallet to support the operations of a network.
